questions.text: What does 'AI' stand for in technology?
questions.explanation: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence, the simulation of human intelligence by machines.

questions.text: What is the tallest building in the world (as of 2024)?
questions.explanation: The Burj Khalifa in Dubai stands at 828 meters (2,717 feet) tall.

questions.text: What social media platform is known for short videos and was created by ByteDance?
questions.explanation: TikTok, launched internationally in 2017, became a global phenomenon for short-form video content.

questions.text: Which rover landed on Mars in 2021?
questions.explanation: NASA's Perseverance rover landed on Mars in February 2021 to search for signs of ancient life.

questions.text: What is the name of the AI chatbot released by OpenAI in 2022?
questions.explanation: ChatGPT was released by OpenAI in November 2022 and quickly became widely used.

questions.text: What is the term for when a species no longer exists anywhere on Earth?
questions.explanation: Extinction means a species has completely died out with no living members remaining.

questions.text: What cryptocurrency uses a 'proof of stake' consensus mechanism?
questions.explanation: Ethereum transitioned to proof of stake in 2022 with 'The Merge' to reduce energy consumption.
